work: Epistle to the Son of the Wolf
author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: يا شيخ انّ المظلوم يسأل اللّه تبارک و تعالی ان يجعلک فاتح باب الانصاف و يظهر بک امره بين العباد انّه هو المقتدر العزيز الوهّاب *
translation: O Shaykh! This Wronged One beseecheth God - blessed and glorified be He - to make thee the one who will open the door of justice, and reveal through thee His Cause among His servants. He, verily, is the All-Powerful, the Almighty, the All-Bounteous.
